channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 1st April
item.description:

item.title: Tree is too big, taller than our house, undermining pathway, impacting garden wall and garden, 1st April
item.description:

item.title: General poor condition of pavements, 1st April
item.description:
Outside of Lumiere Restaurant. For the second time already this year we have taken an elderly person to hospital who has fallen outside the restaurant due to the condition of the paving slabs. This time a significant facial injury and 2 broken wrists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clarence Parade, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
